content: Is there a list of upcoming lean-related events somewhere? Hackathons, workshops, etc.?
:face_palm:
In my defense, googling for “mathlib events” did not bring that to the top. Hopefully this message, once in the archive and indexed, can help a bit.
The page was added less than a month ago.
Hopefully LFTCM is taped and put on YouTube again for those that are not able to attend in person.
People were asking about that on Twitter too
I guess, for some in-person activities, it makes no sense to tape them.
In-person activity would even potentially be fruitful if the video showed the suggestions of more experienced users and the reasons for their suggestions as people were trying to figure out things.
